body: Welcome Teachers Fort Union Trading Post NHS is working to provide quality curriculum-based resources and activities for teachers.     Curriculum Materials  The park offers an assortment of lesson plans and activities created to help teachers use park resources for their curriculum needs.    Plan a Field Trip   The park offers engaging ranger-led field trip tours through the site. As the site is free, there is no fee for these programs. Field trips are welcome year around with a reservation, 701-572-9083.
title: Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site: Education
